title: Tvastr25 - The Analytics Fest
description: Our first-ever analytics fest, bringing together data enthusiasts from across the country for workshops, competitions, and presentations.
details: What started as a vision has now become a milestone! With immense joy and pride, we share a few glimpses from Tvastr25, the first-ever analytics fest organized by the Analytics Club, School of Management Studies, University of Hyderabad. From workshops and quizzes to hands-on competitions and final presentations - Tvastr brought together data enthusiasts from across the country through Unstop.

title: ML Spark Competition
description: An ML competition on real-world scenarios.
details: Participants were challenged with a real-world dataset and had to build a machine learning model to solve a specific problem. This event tested both their technical skills and their ability to think critically under pressure.

title: Decode and Display Competition
description: A thrilling Power BI challenge designed to test participants problem-solving skills and analytical thinking in a competitive environment.
details: The Decode Challenge was a competitive event where participants used Power BI to create insightful dashboards,reports and to present their insights. It was a great opportunity to showcase their data storytelling abilities.

title: SQL Workshop
description: A hands-on workshop covering essential data analysis techniques and tools, perfect for beginners and those looking to refresh their skills.
details: This workshop was tailored for beginners and individuals seeking to refresh their data analysis skills. It covered key topics such as data cleaning, joins, common table expressions (CTEs), and subqueries in Snowflake.

title: Group Discussion (GD)
description: The GD session sharpened participants communication and teamwork skills by engaging them in real-world analytical discussions.
details: The GD session conducted for the junior batch was a learning experience in developing communication and teamwork. The focus was on building critical communication skills, an analyst's essential toolkit, and the platform for participants to share insights, debate ideas, and engage in productive dialogue.
